snippet: Emanuel Gat, a choreographer known for making his own rules, breaks down the music in a work performed by the Ballet du Grand Théâtre de Genève at the Joyce Theater.
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews Preludes & Fugues, choreographed by Emanuel Gat and performed by the Ballet du Grand Theatre de Geneve at the Joyce Theater.
lead_paragraph: Emanuel Gat, a choreographer known for making his own rules, breaks down the music in a work performed by the Ballet du Grand Théâtre de Genève at the Joyce Theater.
